function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear research on virus origin","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding transmissive pathways and preventing future pandemics","Mitigation":"Increase funding for research on virus origin and encourage international collaboration","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing and analysis, epidemiological research","People":"Global health organizations, research institutions","Owner":"Governments, global health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential intermediate hosts in animal species","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and controlling potential transmission from animals to humans","Mitigation":"Conduct research on animal susceptibility, monitor and regulate animal markets and trade","Technologies":"Vaccine development, animal disease surveillance","People":"Animal health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Contaminated water or environment as a source of infection","Impact":"Increased risk of human infections through environmental exposure","Mitigation":"Improve water and environmental sanitation, conduct regular testing of water sources","Technologies":"Water treatment and purification technologies, environmental monitoring systems","People":"Public health organizations, environmental protection agencies","Owner":"Local and national government authorities"}]}
